vietnam.description: A fascinating country between tradition and modernity, from terraced rice fields to paradise bays.

cambodia.description: Ancient Angkor temples, Khmer smiles and preserved nature.

thailand.description: Idyllic beaches, golden temples and incomparable cuisine, Thailand offers an immersion between spirituality and celebration.

laos.description: A peaceful and authentic country, crossed by the Mekong, where time seems to have stopped.

myanmar.description: Between golden pagodas, peaceful lakes and warm smiles, Myanmar reveals a timeless Asia.

malaysia.description: A fascinating blend of modernity and tropical nature, from Kuala Lumpur's skyscrapers to paradise islands.

singapore.description: Futuristic and green city-state, Singapore impresses with its cleanliness, safety and cultural blend.

indonesia.description: An archipelago of a thousand faces, Indonesia combines volcanoes, beaches and spirituality in a spectacular natural setting.

philippines.description: An archipelago with turquoise waters, perfect for diving, dream beaches and warm encounters.

brunei.description: Small but wealthy, Brunei captivates with its golden mosques and lush preserved nature.

eastTimor.description: A confidential, wild and authentic destination, between mountains, beaches and Portuguese culture.

france.description: Between art, gastronomy and varied landscapes — from the Alps to the Côte d'Azur, France charms at every corner.

italy.description: A journey between history, art and dolce vita: from Rome to Tuscany, Italy is a living masterpiece.

spain.description: Sunny atmosphere, tapas and flamenco: Spain combines culture, celebration and authenticity.

greece.description: Blue and white islands, ancient ruins and the Aegean Sea: Greece embodies the perfect Mediterranean journey.

portugal.description: Sun, music and sweet living: Portugal charms with its colorful cities and golden beaches.

croatia.description: Between turquoise sea, medieval towns and natural parks, Croatia is a jewel of the Adriatic coast.

switzerland.description: Mountains, lakes and fresh air: Switzerland is a paradise for nature and tranquility lovers.

austria.description: Country of music and mountains, Austria combines imperial culture and Alpine hiking.

iceland.description: A land of fire and ice where volcanoes, geysers and northern lights create a unique spectacle.

ireland.description: Between cliffs, castles and pubs, Ireland charms with its friendliness and green landscapes.

norway.description: Majestic fjords, untouched nature and scenic routes: Norway offers a grandiose journey.

hungary.description: Thermal baths, architecture and gastronomy: Budapest shines between tradition and modernity.

morocco.description: From Marrakech souks to the Sahara desert, discover a country of a thousand colors.
morocco.bestTime: March to May, September to November

egypt.description: Pyramids, ancient temples and Nile cruises in the cradle of civilization.

kenya.description: Exceptional safaris and paradisiacal beaches of the Indian Ocean.
kenya.bestTime: June to October, January to February

tanzania.description: Kilimanjaro, Serengeti and Zanzibar: the essence of East Africa.

southafrica.description: Safaris, Cape vineyards and spectacular landscapes of the Garden Route.

madagascar.description: Endemic fauna, baobabs and isolated beaches on the island continent.

usa.description: Grandiose national parks, iconic cities and legendary road trips.

canada.description: Wild nature, turquoise lakes and cosmopolitan cities between modernity and wilderness.

mexico.description: Caribbean beaches, Mayan sites and colorful colonial cities.

peru.description: Machu Picchu, Lake Titicaca and the Inca civilization in the heart of the Andes.

brazil.description: Rio de Janeiro, Amazon and paradisiacal beaches in South America's largest country.

argentina.description: Buenos Aires, Patagonian glaciers and Mendoza vineyards.

chile.description: Atacama Desert, vineyards and spectacular end-of-the-world landscapes.

colombia.description: Colonial Cartagena, Andean coffee and exceptional biodiversity.
